segments.text: I ’ d like to send this parcel to Australia .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Certainly . Could you put it on the scales , so I can check the weight ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sure . It ’ s not very heavy .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That ’ s 850 grams . The coasts depends on how you would like to send it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I see . What are the options ? I suppose airmail is faster and more expensive than surface mail .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That ’ s right . Sending it by airmail will cost twelve dollars and sending it by surface mail will cost eight dollars .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How long will it take to get there ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Airmail should take four or five days and surface mail should take about two weeks .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It that case , I ’ ll send it by airmail . I ’ d like to send it as a registered parcel .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No problem . That ’ s one dollar extra .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thanks very much . There ’ s thirteen dollars .
segments.speaker: S1
